name: Slime (itch) (CertainlySnazzy)
description:
A/Left Arrow to move left, D/Right Arrow to move right, Space to jump. Collect all the coins in the level to reveal the exit door. It's not supposed to be easy, expect to die a lot.

This is my first game in Unity, all feedback is welcome. It's not nearly done, but I hope you enjoy the few levels there is so far.
